text: "When I'm Gone" is a Dance-pop/Electropop/House song by Swedish DJ Alesso and American singer Katy Perry. It was released on December 29, 2021 prior to the first date of Play.https://edm.com/news/alesso-katy-perry-announce-new-single- music-video-when-im-gone A music video for the song premiered on Janruary 10, 2022. ==References== Category:2021 songs Category:Katy Perry songs
title: When I'm Gone
